title: Hi, I'm
a Software engineer
quickDescription: With 2+ years experienced in creating scalable web applications with modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks.
name: Kismath ADELEKE

items.description: Completed through a two-year apprenticeship at Bien’ici as a full-stack developer. Degree focused on  software engineering and compilation theory.
Developed strong foundations in software development and systems design.
Main courses: mathematics, physics and life and earth sciences

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
items.context: Development of innovative 3D digital solutions (3D plans, virtual tours, and configurable visits) to promote new real estate programs tailored to the needs of property developers.

team.title: Team
team.content: 5 members (3 developers, 1 product owner, 1 product manager)

tools.title: Tools
tools.content: Vue.js, Express.js, Node.js, TypeScript, HTML/SCSS, Git, Jira, Jenkins, Bitbucket, AWS, Docker

tasks.title: Tasks
content: Utilizing design patterns, including dependency injection
Developing new features and ensuring the corrective and evolutive maintenance of the application
Optimizing application performance to ensure a smooth and intuitive user experience
Participating in code reviews and reverse engineering
Continuously deploying the application on AWS using Docker and Jenkins

results.title: Results
content: Optimized the performance of MyHabiteo Studio (a tool for exporting high-quality perspectives from any virtual or configurable visit), resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.
Redesigned the 3D mega widget (a 3D visualization tool for real estate projects), improving user experience across all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop).
Delivered 12 configurable virtual tours, each sold at a unit price of €3,000.

items.title: DevSecOps Developer
items.context: Automated application management using WAPT packages (deployment, updates, and removal) for the company's clients.

tools.title: Tools
tools.content: Python, WAPT, Git, Windows Server, Flask, SQL Server

tasks.title: Tasks
content: Developed a Python script to automate the deployment of software packages
Collaborated with the development team to enhance application security and performance
Built a dashboard to visualize deployment data within clients' IT infrastructures

results.title: Results
content: Reduced manual workload by 50% through automation of software package deployments
Decreased deployment time by 40% by implementing a continuous integration pipeline

contactMe.title: Contact me
contactMe.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to send me a message.

title: A little about
Me
allaboutMe.intro: Passionate developer, I am driven by creating impactful digital experiences. What sets me apart? A quick learning ability, precision in solving complex problems, and a constant drive to improve.
strengthsDetails: Design of innovative solutions: Automations and high-performing web applications.
Adaptability: Tackling diverse projects in demanding technical environments.
Effective collaboration: I believe in teamwork to achieve ambitious results.
myEngine: Transforming ideas into concrete, useful, and intuitive solutions.

pageNotFound.title: Look like you're lost
pageNotFound.description: The page you are looking for is not available. Please check the URL or go back to the homepage.

quickLearning.title: Quick Learning
quickLearning.description: Best software developers are often fantastic self-learners.The ideal skill any person can have is understanding how to learn, and ideal developers have acquired the skill of self-learning.

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Problem-solving is a one of the most important part of the work. Problem-solving also has to do with utilizing creativity and logical thought processes to identify problems and resolve them with software.

admitMistakes.title: Admit Mistakes
admitMistakes.description: We, as software developers, need to learn to admit our mistakes. Of course, making mistakes happens to all of us.The most important thing to do is to make an effort to learn from them and try to avoid them in the future.

items.title: Behind the screen: my failures, my lessons, and my passion for code
items.description: An authentic and sincere journey of a developer, between learning, technical challenges, and resilience in the face of failure. Discover the lessons learned from a journey into the world of code.

items.title: The battle between frontend and backend: How about we stop fighting?
items.description: Find out how I learned to love the frontend and the backend, and why it's time to end the war between the two.

items.title: Clock Manager App
items.description: A simple clock manager app that allows you to add, edit, and delete clocks for different time zones. The goal was to create a modular application while applying the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern

items.title: Birthday personnalized wish App
items.description: Birthday personnalized wish App to send birthday wishes to your loved ones. The goal was to create a fun and interactive using React

items.title: Password Generator
items.description: A simple password generator that allows you to generate a random password based on your preferences. The goal was to create a simple, user-friendly application using vanilla JavaScript.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: A personal portfolio website that showcases my projects, skills, and experience. The goal was to create a visually appealing, responsive website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

items.title: Checkers game
items.description: A simple checkers game with another player. The goal was to create a desktop game using Qt and C++.

contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to send me a message.
